meanings.definition: To strike with a sharp blow or slap.
meanings.sent1: She was whapping the table to get everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The boxer was whapping his opponent with powerful punches.
meanings.sent3: The chef was whapping the dough to make the perfect pizza crust.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm was whapping the windows with heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The teacher whapped the ruler on the desk to quiet the class.

meanings.sent1: The whapping on the door startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent2: He felt the whapping on his back after the playful slap.
meanings.sent3: The whapping of the waves against the shore sounded like music.
meanings.sent4: The whapping of the branches in the wind created a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The sudden whapping on his shoulder made him jump in surprise.
